code:
graph TD
    subgraph "OAuth 2.0 Model (Access-Based)"
        A[User] -->|Login| B[Identity Provider]
        B -->|Access Token| C[Application]
        C -->|Token + Request| D[Resource Server]
        D -->|Checks Scope| E{Valid Token?}
        E -->|Yes| F[Grant Access]
        E -->|No| G[Deny Access]
    end
    
    style A fill:#e1f5fe
    style F fill:#c8e6c9
    style G fill:#ffcdd2
